| History                 = Grand Council of Mages had a similar history to its [[Earth-TRN892]] [[Grand Council of Mages (Earth-TRN892)|counterpart]]. When [[Stephen Strange (Earth-616)|Doctor Strange]] prevented that its member [[Zoloz (Earth-616)|Zoloz]] stole his powers, he also convinced the alien to become herald of [[Galan (Earth-616)|Galactus]] to save [[Zarax|his planet]]. But other [[Zaraxians]] believed Zoloz a coward because he wasn't died fighting.{{r|Doctor Strange Vol 5 17}}
